rushfiles_file_added: ${user} added file ${rushfiles_path} to Tsukaeru FileBako in ${node}
rushfiles_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${rushfiles_path} in Tsukaeru FileBako in ${node}
rushfiles_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${rushfiles_path} in Tsukaeru FileBako in ${node}
rushfiles_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Tsukaeru FileBako addon for ${node}
rushfiles_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Tsukaeru FileBako addon for ${node}
